name: Block Clicker (Full Release)
description:
CHANGE LOG:
 Version 1.1 (6/16/22) Added 8 Achievements:
  • 6 Upgrade Achievements (when upgrading, you'll get an Upgrade Point, which will be used to unlock those achievements)
  • 2 new secret Achievements (Those Achievements are According for $$$ Only, so try find it by yourself!)
Fixed Various Bugs Like:
  • When you Upgrade the Percentage Upgrade Once from Extras, you were able to get infinite  amounts of "Current Multiplier" when Making a Prestige at 0 "Generated Multiplier"
  • Achievements sometimes don't show
  • Fixed some Code System Issue at the Beginning, It was Because the Source Code saved the Last Save that was made by me After Converting it into a Game.
Added one Secret Upgrade on Black Market Menu:
  • That Upgrade is pretty much an unexplained Upgrade, but it leads to something...
Buffs Added:
  • Star Multiplier After Upgrade For Chapter 1 1.2x>3x
Version 1.0
Release of the Game.

Disclaimer:

All sounds were used and owned by:
Minecraft
TobyFox

the game Was Inspired by:
Scrap Clicker, Scrap Clicker 2, Cookie Clicker and Minecraft (for the Achievements)

In this Game you have to Purely Finish the game by Auto Clicking on that Simple Button, Upgrade as many Stars as you can and be able to crank up to the tops on the LeaderBoards!

This Scratch Game was made Purely Solo by Me, also Featuring Cloud Variables.

This Game Also Save System Using Codes and Cloud Variables
